Was he part of a more evil plan all along? What evils from the past were playing with his future? He wants revenge and everything comes with a price.

title: Hantu Gigi
description: A village that was once peaceful is now in turmoil due to disturbances by a ghost called Hantu Gigi. The daily activities of the villagers are disrupted by fear of this creature. Various stories spread, but their authenticity remains uncertain. The villagers accuse each other of harboring that ghost.

title: Abnormal Activity 3
description: Just when we thought the demonic parodies were over, the sister of the girl from the first movie discovers the demons may have returned! This time in the form of a missing baby. Was her babysitting business just a really bad idea, or are demons indeed to blame thanks to the first movie? Never before has a film series skipped over an unnecessary sequel and went right for part 3!

title: Lady M.
description: Lady M- (A modern silent film) A spiritual , bloody tale of revenge from beyond the grave!!. A woman (Kenyon Page) who is in a hit and run accident and left for dead by numerous witnesses, calls upon the avenging spirit of Lady Midday to wreak havoc on the guilty.

title: Redemption of the Undead
description: When Chase discovers that he can't make up for past mistakes, he must accept the responsibility of existing in life after death.

title: Daughter of Fear
description: A stylized "Punk Noir" thriller that explores the psychological effects of abuse.

title: Frankenstein
description: Staying as close to the novel as much as possible. Victor Frankenstein creates a chemical that could bring the dead back to life.

title: Dilarang Masuk
description: Lost on a trek high up in the foggy hills, 4 friend chance upon an abandoned bungalow where they seek shelter for the night. Everything fell apart when they found a pile of gold.

title: Deep Seeded
description: While trying to pick up the pieces of their shattered lives as a result of their mother's untimely and unexpected demise, Lauren (Janine Anzalone) and Ashley (Little Italy), find themselves face-to-face with their mother's hidden past and a... current demon named Brad (Kam Lee) who has to wrestle demons of his own while furiously trying to drown out the hateful taunts of a father long dead but still haunting him. In this Revenge thriller, Deep Seeded takes vengeance to an elevated level by showing just how sinister Brad is and how shocking the brutality can be

title: The Shadow Within Me
description: Leon meets his shadow. The time has come for change.

title: Radio London
description: Can Tariq Solomon, an innocent man accused of a heinous crime, ever return back to society? What are the secrets that bind him to the refugee girl and the street preacher he encounters under the shadow of intense media scrutiny?

title: Demon of Castlebury
description: Grace, a young nurse's aid takes a summer job at a historic New England mill house, becoming the new caretaker for Barbara. But Grace's plans for a relaxing summer are transformed when an ancient demonic force returns to claim a new soul.

title: Vindication
description: After a girl gets kidnapped and her boyfriend ends up in the hospital a group of teenagers are left newspaper clippings of her. Soon enough someone starts stalking these teenagers and eventually it starts getting violent. Now it is up to these teenagers to figure out how they are connected to this girl and who is stalking them before its too late.

title: First Look: Hatchet II
description: A short behind the scenes documentary on the making of Hatchet II.

title: Ulterior
description: Sophie starts receiving unwanted attention from a secret admirer who is indicating that he is observing her at work. She becomes fixated with the truth behind it all. When the attention stops she drops her guard, only to be confronted with a life changing incident. Her external problems are compounded by her desire to keep the truth from those around her and find the solution to her problems alone.

title: Paranorma There Is Always a Dark Side
description: How Khaled met Sommer and his life got changed.

title: Not Found 2
description: 2nd entry in the Japanese horror found footage series "Not Found".

title: Blood Canvas
description: A team of 13 actors and filmmakers get together to shoot a film entitled "Blood Canvas" in ONE DAY! This film is a story about an artist named Simon who holds a reunion at his private mansion to celebrate his achievements in the field of fine art. During their stay, he uses his guests as subjects of his next big art project.

title: Revenge
description: This is a 70's style Grindhouse horror comedy.This man wants revenge for a crime he didn't commit.

title: Fugue
description: After moving in with her boyfriend, a young woman comes to believe her new home is haunted. But when she discovers the last nine months have been wiped from her memory, she must unearth what caused the condition ... before the past catches up with her.

title: Revived
description: After trespassing at an abandoned house a pair of friends become increasingly tormented by a restless spirit.

title: Entropie
description: A petty criminal wants to leave his milieu and profession and makes himself available as a key witness against a feared gangster boss. His lover and a secret agent, who are confronted with a mysterious threat, also have to learn that the separation from the past is not easy.

title: Safe Haven: A Zombie Movie
description: A zombie epidemic is spread through sexually transmitted disease.

title: Sie
description: A German audiobook for 'Sie ('She' / 'Misery)' narrated by David Nathan.

title: Bone Cave
description: T Rad and Mike are two college slackers who devise a clever scheme to throw a gigantic rave to end all raves. With the help of a sexy, seductive Annora, they secure a remote cave for the ultimate party experience. Things appear to be going great until they realize that they have stumbled straight into the lair of a mysterious killer Bones Magee. With inspirational cues from horror classics like "Friday the 13th" and "Nightmare on Elm Street", Bone Cave' is a retro slasher film full of blood, guts, and amazing one liners.

title: Relic
description: An audiobook for 'Relic' narrated by David Colacci.

title: I Hate L.A.
description: Big laughs mix with gory kills in this TWILIGHT ZONE inspired suspense tale when tension in Hollywood boils over and its inhabitants finally reveal the flawed monsters they really are.

title: No. 32, B District
description: A couple moves into a new house and observe a series of strange and possibly paranormal events that leads them to setup surveillance cameras, recording everything that takes place.

title: Misteri Hantu Selular
description: A youth group terrorized by the ghost who always come after their phone playing automatically the mysterious ringtone

title: Synergia
description: The eccentric story of lovers slowly growing apart and a portrayal of the misunderstanding between gender.

title: Dracula: Consummation
description: Van Helsing has gathered together a group to pursue the evil vampire Count Dracula. Their trust will be shaken and their faith put to the ultimate test as the battle between good and evil reaches its final consummation.

title: In Transition
description: A goodbye between two sisters after one is bitten by a zombie.

title: Unprecedented Sickness
description: An experimental film is set in an unheard of sickness.

title: L'étranger de minuit: l'oeuvre original
description: Here is the short film that inspired the main work, 'L'étranger de minuit'. At Willow Creek, while a serial killer terrorizes the nights of the city, two friends are taken hostage in their home by the murderer.

title: Workout Video: Part 1
description: Part one of an experimental trilogy of workout videos. This video is intended for beginners.

title: Rubber Nurse
description: How the life of a fast living rich girl from Connecticut is instantly changed after she comes down with a rare disease.

title: Momok Jangan Panggil Aku
description: Ramlee receives a call from his old friend Aziz to attend his "Kenduri" at Kampung Pulau Rusa in Pahang. Excited, Kassim then invites his close friends to join him as they go for a road trip from KL to Pahang along the Karak Highway. With his two friends, Qaseh, a writer who writes supernatural novels and Sudin, the trio prepare for a fun journey to Pahang. Feeling bored along the way, Qaseh decides to share some of her many ghost stories from her upcoming novel that feature ghosts like 'hantu Raya','Polong','Saka' and many more. Little did they know that the innocent story telling would be more than what they've bargained for.

title: The Bride of Diablo Canyon
description: After a weekend in Vegas, 3 friends encounter some strange events and even stranger people during their drive back to California. But this isn't your typical horror movie... You'll find yourself covering your eyes one minute and laughing your ass off the next. It might even make you hungry for human meat... if you catch my drift.

title: Horror Punks: They Came from the Grave Vol. 1
Cannibal
description: This is the story of the darkest side of humanity, and its unyielding need for redemption. Walter, a man so filled with shame, he deems himself unfit for society and flees deep into the wilderness hoping to escape the irreversible damage he has caused. One day, the bearded exile happens upon an abandoned campsite and decides it would be as good a place as any to make his home. Though seemingly alone, with no accusers to face, Walter finds his conscience and memories will not allow him to flee. Nor will the dark 'presence' in the woods. A traveler, named Carling, who happens upon his campsite one morning, further shatters his solitude. Despite Walter's reluctance, Carling persists in befriending the "modern ape-man", shrugging off his threats and misanthropy by offering gifts. Carling finds Walter to be the perfect sounding board for his unorthodox views on spiritualism and death. Although his views may seem shockingly honest and difficult to swallow, they are never malevolent. In fact, Carling seems to take pleasure in the simple things, like a good conversation, a shiny red apple, and old clichés like 'curiosity killed the cat." Over time, Walter's living conditions begin to take their toll on his body, as well as his state of mind. When he becomes very ill, Carling proves his friendship to Walter by making his final days as comfortable as possible. He shows him that all men are deserving of love. All they need is the willingness to accept it.

title: True Storys of the Ghost House 2 the Movie
description: Yannick & Noah has not seen each other for a year. But now the Yannick & Noah films the unknown horror.

title: Killer Stories
description: A collection of three horror stories that evolves around serial killers told by a couple in which one has a dark secret.

title: Rigor Mortis
description: A short horror film about a man who falls asleep at work one day, and then wakes up in an altered reality.

title: Tuesday Night
description: A young college student decides to stay in for the night rather than go out with her friend, only to face a night of terror as she becomes the victim of a home invasion.

title: O Tormento de Mathias
description: Mathias is a feared serial killer that is enclosed in a mental institution for decades. When a reporter start to investigate his past, the story of Mathias is told by relatives of his victims and by the survivors of his attacks.

title: Demonica's Reign
description: One Person's desire to free and control a Demon sets off a horrific chain of events, and the protectors are left scrambling to conceal the secret. To release the Demon is to wreak havoc and reign death down upon all mankind.

title: Billboard
description: A dark, twisted tale of two young suicidal characters who, through a series of unfortunate events, come together for one crazy night.

title: Jiong Tan Jia Ren
description: The story is about a detective and his beautiful partner. They try their best to find out the truth behind a mysterious case and fall in love with each other.

title: Fuuin Eizou 4: Inugami no Juhou
description: 4th entry in the 'Sealed Video' franchise from the production team of 'Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video'.

title: Sweet Goodbyes
description: John sits in his car, having second thoughts about leaving with Ruth. She persuades him to come with her but this is no ordinary journey and Ruth isn't quite what she seems. Sweet Goodbyes is a micro short with a shocking twist.

title: Trailer Terror
description: "Trailer Terrors" was a 2011 special feature on "The Dreadful Hallowgreen Special" DVD release - hosted by Danielle Gelehrter as "Penny Dreadful" and Larry Underwood as "Dr. Gangrene".

title: Shadow of Horror
description: A group of friends play a joke on a young woman, ending up in her getting killed. Her spirit then haunts them for revenge, killing them off one by one.

title: Follow the Sun!
description: A drive-in preshow quickly devolves into a hellish nightmare.

title: Bee Dead
description: Nathan Reynolds, is a young man who has to fight against the odds to stop the zombie apocalypse, all while trying to make a school documentary with his two pot-head roommates, and win the love of his fellow classmate, Julie.

title: Kakusei: kyoufu ni mezameru rokutsu no sutori
description: Horror omnibus drama, you can't sleep anymore...! You may experience it next...Is it okay to trust the person next to you right now? A thrilling and scary short story!

title: Deliriotic
description: Hero Gregson is on a journey. A metaphysical trip to another dimension.

title: Locked
description: Locked Official Movie 2011 -Have you ever wanted to escape your Worst Nightmare?

title: Cursed Local Urban Legends: Kanagawa Edition
description: Third installment in a series about famous local urban legends. This installment includes 'Barnacle Man', 'Satoru-kun' and more.

title: Fjordbeistet
description: 4 boys from a little village called "Beisfjord" gets a school project about making a film, they decide to make a documentary about an accident in "Skamdalen" near Beisfjord during the 60's. As they working on it, they found out much more then they expect.

title: Hatchet II: Meet the FX Team
description: A short video documentary on the make-up effects team behind Hatchet II.

title: Revenge Radio
description: After Matt a young factory worker has his heart broken by his girlfriend of two years he looks for a way to cope with the pain.

title: 2 Channel no Noroi - VOL. 4
description: Fourth volume in the 2 Channel series.

title: Suffering Fools
description: On Halloween night, a young woman shows a group of soulless suburbanites the pure evil that resides within us all.

title: Harvey's Dream
description: Harvey and Janet Stevens are living the perfect life in the perfect house or so it seems. Janet has been secretly having an affair with Harvey's best friend Frank. What they don't know is Harvey may not be as in the dark as they suspect.

title: Bite Me Back II
description: Two roommates, Mike and Greg, struggle with school, socializing and trying to meet girls as zombies overtake the school and Mike and Greg are left to fight them off. It all begins with Clarkson students sneaking into Dana dining hall and putting nuclear waste into the food. This nuclear waste turns all who eat it into flesh-eating zombies. Mike and Alex do not eat at the dining hall that night, after hearing about the opportunity to get out and meet new people with a party going on at the townhouses. When these two unlikely heroes return to campus, they are left to struggle with school, socializing, trying to meet girls and fighting off zombies.

title: A New Design
description: A mystery about a woman with amnesia figuring out who she is.

title: Room for Rent
description: When Joan's roommate moves out without notice, what is she to do? Good thing for Joan her friend thinks she has the answer to her problems.

title: Psyche
description: A night in a haunted place... how will you control your mind?

title: Family Ties
description: Kyle, adopted when he was a toddler, returns to his birth home after 20 years. Hoping to find out who he is, he stumbles upon 20 years of family secrets. Some things are meant to be forgotten.

title: Exsanguination
description: One dark room. Two bound strangers. And, a whole lot of blood.

title: Bayou Butcher
description: Four friends take a trip "down the bayou", never to return.

title: Nevermore - Três Pesadelos e Um Delírio de Edgar Allan Poe
description: A collection of three short stories and one poem by Edgar Allan Poe adapted for the screen. Berenice, Morella, The Raven and Ligea like never before seen on film. The movies explore the sensuality, the opium driven dreams and the horror which are the essence of Poe's works. A visually stunning work by the same makers of horror-indie-hit 'Morgue Story'.

title: Deep Within
description: The psychiatrist Anna go on holiday with her daughter to the South of Italy where her father lives. Anna meets an old lawyer friend who asks her to run a psychiatric examination on a man who killed in a moment of homicidal madness.

title: Silver Cell
description: A Wicked, Atmospheric journey into the dark depths of the human psyche...

title: An Internet World
description: You can't choose a woman the way you choose a pair of pants.

title: The Last Trick or Treater
description: Mr. Morley is dying from cancer and tortured by the memory of a cruel prank which took place on Halloween night many years before. Sometimes the past can come back to haunt you. On this night, Mr. Morley is going to learn Halloween can be more trick than treats.

title: Terror Basket: Siren's Song
description: Louise, star of her university swim team, becomes paranoid that a strange creature is out to get her and begins to unravel a sinister conspiracy.

title: Playstation Network Offline: The Movie - ZERODX
description: In 2011 the Ps3's network had been hacked with everyone who used losing all of their data and personal information on their account. But one man named Enrico began to go crazy. So he hid in his own bunker to hide from the hackers and investigates deeper and deeper. He then calls his friend Al to tell him to stay safe and hide as no one is safe, but as he desperately tries to also get him to help him all of his plans fail. Will he ever find the truth about this event? Or will he be stuck into insanity?

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 42
description: 42th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: Fantastic Movie Trailers 10: Midnight Madness 3!
description: Welcome to this tenth compilation of fantastic movie trailers! From the early black & white "Spook-shows" to the 70's Grindhouse exploitation double bills, midnight shows were always where you could find the craziest, most daring movies. This compilation is made up of trailers from original midnight shows features. Gross horror, sexy exploitation, crazy sci-fi, this DVD covers it all.

title: Baka
description: A creepy experimental narrative horror.

title: Hold the Mayo
description: Sam is a beleaguered sandwich store clerk who is having a very bad day. Then he has a life-altering encounter with Frank - a force of nature who believes the customer is always right. Horribly, horribly right. 'Hold The Mayo' is a gruesome comedy about words that cannot be unspoken, and sandwiches that cannot be unmade. Profound philosophical questions lead to graphic consequences, all pivoting around the world's most foul condiment.

title: Another Zombie Flick: The Making of a Low Budget Zombie Movie
description: "Another Zombie Flick" explores the inner workings of an independent film crew's quest to make a unique Zombie movie, "Zombie Doomsday."

title: S.O.S.
description: A young married couple have an economic troubles. The wife of Marcos decides secretly make an insanity for get some money.

title: The Kid Next Door
description: With this film I have created a narrative that explores the themes of transformation, and the inner demon that can hide within us all. Specifically the fear that is the basis for many classic monster stories the fear that you yourself can become the monster.

title: Fuuin Eizou 3: Hai Tunnel no Noroi
description: 3rd entry in the 'Sealed Video' franchise from the production team of 'Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video'.

title: Octoberfeast
description: A family secret hidden for decades is about to become a bloody nightmare.

title: One Year to Hell
description: David was an all-round bad person. He was horrible to everyone in his life, including his wife. Shortly after dying of cancer, David is approached by a mysterious man named Jack. Jack gives David one year to make all the wrongs in his life right. Soon after mending his relationship with his wife and quickly approaching his one year, David starts seeing Jack everywhere he goes. David now must face the reality that after his year is up, so will his contract with the Devil.

title: No Noroi Jikenbo
description: A shivering psychic and bizarre horror film consisting of 3 stories from the team of the "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series. A story about a doctors' organ transplant methods, a dietitian and a cursed bank transfer scam.

title: Amarillo
description: The story centers on the life of a singer-songwriter who, after an accident, discovers new skills, all mixed with a story of suspense, love and murder.

title: Arme Seelen
description: The film transcends a dreamlike reality into the mysterious land of poor souls. Witnesses from rural areas of Central Switzerland tell their tales of enigmatic encounters with persons from hereafter, and about outrages by decedents, which have to be expiated. An ethnographic movie about an archaic folk-mythology, 'The Souls' documents a culture of sagas and myths sadly now dying out because, in modern reasoning, death is suppressed and taboo.

title: Blackwater Farm
description: Laura Roberts vacations at 'Blackwater Farm' only to find herself trapped in a maze like abandoned mill with no hope for escape, save for her to become as brutal a killer as those who capture her.

title: Beneeth
description: This killing machine goes on a killing spree after his best friend is killed by the police. They chase him and he chases them.

title: Mistaken
description: Kawashima senses a strange presence inside his apartment, and sets up security cameras in an attempt to find out what that is. Then the doorbell rings, and a succession of other bizarre phenomena send him into a state of panic.

title: De genfødte
description: A deeply devoted Christian family lives in the belief that a second Flood is coming. Racing against time they try to prepare their children for the big day.

title: Shikei dotto netto
description: Angry at your boss or has your best friend betrayed you? No worries. Welcome to DeathPenalty.com where you can find a mysteriously masked ally to solve your problem. But there is a catch. For every murder requested, you must commit one and if you don t follow the plan, you are next!!

title: Merî-san no denwa
description: The members of a girls high's karate club head for a training camp in the mountains. The girls start going crazy and vanishing one by one. Then Minako gets a mysterious call saying "Hello, this is Mary. I'm almost there".

title: The Hitchhiker's Project
description: Three young adults go on an adventure to see what real hitchhiking is really like while recording their experiences.

title: Untitled Screenplay
description: Untitled Screenplay is a film that challenges VCE film makers by playing on the trivialities often associated with student film making. The film is designed not to make fun of, but to highlight these trivialities. Starting in an interrogation room we are introduced to the main character, two police officers are accusing him of a terrible crime, its then revealed that his crime is overly ambitious script writing. We then have a 'flashback/forward' to the main characters first idea being played out on screen, a horror. After his 'flash idea' we come back to the interrogation room, where we then see his next idea, a noir. This repeats one last time ending with an action sequence.

title: The Sin
description: Al tramonto una vampira, come sempre esce per la caccia. Una sera trova una giovane coppia di sposi che hanno dei problemi di fertilità. La ragazza è esuberante: ha una buona notizia da dare al marito. Ma questi non è convinto e si va a fare la doccia pensieroso. La vampira prima uccide il ragazzo sbucando fuori dalla vasca, poi è la volta della ragazza. Ma scopre che questa è incinta. A questo punto ripensa al giorno in cui fu vampirizzata da una crudele vampira: quest'ultima le disse che avrebbe avuto tutto quello che voleva: ricchezza, potere, sesso ma non avrebbe mai rivisto al luce del giorno nè avrebbe mai potuto avere figli. La vampira mette tutta la sua vita in discussione e rivede la sua vita piene di morte, delitti, dolore. Sceglierà così di cambiare radicalmente...

title: Corn-Fed
description: A drifter moves from town to town to fulfill his passion for cooking. As the population drops, his recipe book fills. He wants to have you for dinner.

title: I.C.U
description: Four friends going on a trip out in the woods where there is three psychopaths that doesn't let them out of there sight.

title: K.V.
description: A deadly virus has decimated the world's population. But sometimes death isn't the worst option...

title: Shikei dotto netto: Tân zero
description: When testing out the new, online game "DeathPenalty.com," a group of gamers discover that when they "kill" someone in the game, they are actually murdering someone in real life. Will the attractive Mio discover who the murderer is, or will she end up dead, like her friends?

title: Going Under
description: A drug-dealing teenager tries to break free from the trade before college, but gets dragged back in when a deal goes south.

title: Fred Wilder's Pocket Full of Film: The Essential Collection
Hatchet II: Behind the Screams
description: A video documentary short detailing the entire production of Hatchet II with an in depth look at the cast and crew behind the screams.

title: Enter Darkness
description: Two renegade Vampire Hunters, Antonio Reck and Preston Angeli, get more then they bargained for when they go after an old vampire boss and leader of the world wide crime "Syndicate" that has it's fingers in almost all areas of world trade.

title: Paranoid Activity 2
description: Three college friends move into a small rental house in the middle of a cold, dark Alaskan winter. During a housewarming party, a psychic medium calls forth a ghostly presence that becomes increasingly hostile toward the three. With very few option, they must decide to confront the hostile presence--or die.

title: Element (.245) Zombie
description: After an experiment goes wrong a plague of the undead are released in a small town. The lead team of ZTP (Zombie Termination Patrol) officers meets with a grizzly fate and the veteran exterminator, Agent Romero (himself), is called in to save the day. Will any of the team survive? Will Agent Romero be able to stop the onslaught? Watch the first installment in the Element {.245} series and find out. The Rai Chemical Company is a relatively unknown entity that has managed to escape the stock market. What they produce cannot be bought and their byproduct is something that you never want to see. An accident involving the Top Secret Element {.245} releases a swarm of infected corpses onto the unsuspecting masses. When the government decides to pull the plug, Rai accelerates their work and produces an intelligent zombie. Zombie Prime (Nicole Gregory) escapes the confines of the Rai Chemical Corporation and goes on a killing rampage. She discovers that she can control the corpses she reanimates and the carnage begins. After ambushing Rai's top ZTP (Zombie Termination Patrol) team she sets her sights on the legendary Agent Romero. Rai's number one DSI (Department of Supernatural Investigations) operative. Will Zombie Prime escape Agent Romero and begin her onslaught on the human race? One thing is sure; there will be blood, flesh and corpses along the way.

title: Cursed Local Urban Legends: Tokyo Edition
description: Second installment in a series about famous local urban legends. This installment includes 'Sukima-onna', 'Dragging Woman', 'Daruma-san' and more.

title: Day of the Killer
description: A serial killer who emerges only during the day terrorizes an office worker.

title: Toro Loco
description: The story of Mateo, (Felipe Avello) son of a notorious mob lord of the city, has been dumped by his wife who took his son away. He doesn't resist the shame and hires the most ruthless hit-man available to kill them. He hires Toro Loco, a cold, eccentric assassin with will bring the hell to this family, always under his own twisted rules.

title: Celebrity Paranormal Lockdown Presents Broughton School
description: The Celebrity Paranormal Lockdown crew invite actor Miguel Nunez and Lia Savini (Daughter of Horror Legend Tom Savini) to be locked down overnight in the haunted Broughton School in South Park, Pa.

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 41
description: 41th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: Honto Ni Atta! Kowai Shinrei Supotto 3
description: The production team of "Honto Ni Atta: Kowai Toshi Densetsu" present a variety of haunted spots. The 3 stories included are "Lake Kaminryu", "Kanto Mystery Tour" and "49 Tunnel".

title: Amazing Sucking Slit-Mouthed Woman is Real
description: Dressed in a coat and with her mouth ripped open, she attacks the terrified women and men. But the legendary monster is also a woman - Surrounded by numerous men, she is locked up, bound, and humiliated.

title: John Stanley Meets Jack the Ripper and 25 Other Deadly Encounters
Midnight Abyss
description: Midnight Abyss is a psychological horror film that dwells into the horrors of our own imaginations and nightmares. We follow Tod (Andy Palmer), a regular teenager who appears normal on the outside but is really a trouble individual on the inside. He has been having a reoccurring nightmare that haunts him every night; he is being chased by a silhouetted figure through an eerie forest and no one is around to help him. Towards the end of the dream he hits a dead end and the figure attacks him just before he wakes up. During a lecture in his psychology class the next morning Tod learns more about nightmares and the kinds of psychological effects it can have on the mind, this gives him a chance to try and dissect his own personal nightmare. His best friend, Lucy (Briannah Korin), calls him and invites him over later that night to watch a movie; she has been ill with some sort of unknown sickness and has been confined to her bed for the past week. Tod agrees and later that night they end up watching a horror film involving a vampire (Will Sheffield) chasing after a young woman (Tracy Collins) outside a huge Gothic castle. Being personally terrified of vampires, the movie really gets to Tod. After leaving Lucy's house, he begins to hear and see things on his journey back home and starts to come under the impression that a real vampire is after him. From there we go inside Tod's head and see his nightmares come to life as he struggles to face and overcome his own personal fears.

title: Pineapples & Pork in BAD WRAPS!
description: A teenage girl and her pet mail away fifty proofs of purchase from their favorite brand of frozen burritos for a toy from their favorite TV show. Little do they know, this toy has an appetite more monstrous than theirs! A mix of pretty colors, stop motion, and an a sugar high.

title: Mrityur Haatchhani
description: Anondi got a job in a news channel. She took a house for rent near her office. One day she met Rajarshi. They fell in love. After that she used to see an unknown weird girl. The girl wants to tell her something. She calls her. Anondi got frightened and starts to take counseling. Suddenly she wants to die. Why? Who is the girl?

title: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi: Dai ju hachi-yo
description: 20th installment in Broadway's "Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi" series.

title: Ryoki Tomei Ningen
description: A suspenseful horror film about the fear of an invisible killer.

title: Cursed Local Urban Legends: Hokkaido & Tohoku Edition
description: First installment in a series about famous local urban legends. This installment includes 'Turbo-Granny', 'Gomiko-san' and a story about a delivery person who hears a story of an old woman disappearing on the Tohoku Expressway.

title: 2 Channel no Noroi - VOL. 3
description: Third volume in the 2 Channel series.

title: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi: Dai jukuya
description: 21th installment in Broadway's "Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi" series.

title: Noroi no Saito
description: A haunting real-life horror film based on a terrifying urban legend. There are countless creepy sites scattered all over the Internet. This story follows the terrifying consequences of accessing these sites.

title: Shuddersome
description: Angela Becker enters the house of her recently deceased Aunt Millie after being contacted by estate lawyer Robert Wallace. Once there, she begins to realize the dark secrets hidden within. With the help of Robert, church counselor Duncan McGrainly and her insane sister, Mia, Angela is plunged into an odyssey of horrifying discovery.

title: Destination
description: Two killers staking out their next job are murdered by their cars navigation system.
